Description:
Hewwo!

Welcome to hewwo.space, an inclusive Mastodon instance that celebrates diversity and fosters a vibrant community. Our server is proudly LGBTQIA+ friendly, creating a safe and accepting space for individuals of all gender identities and sexual orientations. Whether you're a furry, a techie, or a passionate member of the railway community, you'll find a warm home here.

We believe in the power of connection and aim to bring people together through shared interests and meaningful conversations. Our multi-fandom environment encourages open dialogue and encourages creativity, making it an ideal platform for artists, writers, and enthusiasts to showcase their talents and find like-minded individuals.

At hewwo.space, we value linguistic diversity and embrace both English and German languages. Feel free to express yourself in the language you're most comfortable with!

Our dedicated team is committed to maintaining a respectful and safe online environment. We actively moderate the instance to prevent harassment, discrimination, or any form of harmful behavior.

Discover new friendships, engage in stimulating discussions, and share your unique perspective with an inclusive and welcoming audience. Together, let's build a positive and inclusive online space that empowers and celebrates our differences.

We are glad that you are here!

Federation Policy

At hewwo.space, we strive to federate with instances that promote a respectful and inclusive atmosphere, backed by strong moderation policies. We actively monitor public timelines to ensure compliance with our guidelines. Instances found to be sharing content that violates our policies may be subject to silencing or suspension, depending on the severity of the violation.

If you feel that your instance has been suspended unjustly, please contact us via the admin email provided above. We are committed to maintaining fairness and addressing any concerns promptly.

Hosting costs

The cost of hewwo.space is approximately 16â‚¬ per month. If you like to support us, you are welcome to do so. Just send us an email and we will give you all further information.

The cover image of this instance takes resources from Freepik.
Short: An LGBTQIA+ friendly instance open to furries, techies, and the railway community. German & English spoken. Join hewwo.social today!

Description:
Description

Welcome to 3615.computer, a queer, neurodivergent, nerds space available for you or anyone else respectful and understanding.

Why do we exist?

Alyx just wanted her owner Mastodon's instance at first.

But with such a cool domain, she had to make a community ğŸ‘¥. It's always something she dreamed of, creating a space, standing back, and see it flourishing with lovely people.

Registrations are ~open~ on approval at the moment, because of the recent spam wave. Ask for one, you should be accepted without any issues ğŸ˜Š

Services

  • ğŸŒ Main web page: home.3615.computer
  • ğŸ˜ Mastodon instance: 3615.computer
    • ğŸ“£ 3615.computer/@team Team account for announcements
    • ğŸ’¬ Telegram channel to discuss and send updates during an incident
    • ğŸš¨ status.3615.computer to let everyone know what's going on during a technical incident

Information

  • ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ Alyx (he/she) is the owner of the organization. See her profile.
  • ğŸ“§ 3615.computer contact: contact@3615.computer

Community

Any constructive feedback will be positive for us. If we can't do better, for sure we will.

Privacy

See our privacy policy.

Hosting

  • 3615.computer is hosted on Fly.io (CDG region)
    • We use CloudFlare R2 for objects storage (media/S3-like)
  • home.3615.computer is hosted on carrd.co
  • status.3615.computer is self-hosted at my place.

We use CloudFlare for our DNS.

Common Hashtags

  • (#3615apÃ©ro)https://3615.computer/tags/3615ap%C3%A9ro: a hashtag used to chill and discuss with others. It means that you want to get interactions on your post. Take a drink and talk with the community!
  • (#3615aide)https://3615.computer/tags/3615aide: do you need help with something, anything? The community might help you!
  • (#3615zinzin)https://3615.computer/tags/3615aide: sometimes, we need to share our mental health issues, eventually get advice, or just support from the community. The community might interact with you. If you don't want that, we understand, just say so explicitly.

Staff

  • @Team

Owners

  • @Alyx

Moderators

  • @Alyx
  • @eveningsempire
Short:
3615.computer is a bit of a nerdy name, but we are welcoming everyone. Actually, we don't want "just another nerd instance". The name was too cool to not use it.
More at: https://home.3615.computer

Description:
ğŸ¦„ Welcome to kopimi.space

kopimi.space is a small and stable Mastodon server for people to find new friends and have a lot of fun. We are not tied to a specific topic, but mostly focus on DRM, software freedom, piracy etc. By visiting this site you agree to the terms of service below and our privacy policy.

A project by koyu.space

ğŸ˜€ Fediverse Friendly Moderation Covenant

This instance commits to the following

1. Administration and Moderation will be handled as neutral as possible

Reports and widespread information on specific instances (often known as bad actors) will be verified and actions might be taken as necessary.

2. Actions taken will respond to the bare minimum to keep the network operating and not influence the ability of the instances users to connect to other people

  • If another instance spreads media content of questionable legality for the region the current instance is operating from, these files might be rejected from being saved.
  • If another instance is sharing hateful messages that impact local users, there might be consideration of silencing that specific instance from being visible in timelines. If users follow and/or wish to follow users on the target instance, they are still free to do so.
  • If another instance is posting content illegal in the local instance operation region or actively posts content attacking local users, a full instance block might be the last resort.

3. Communication before Actions

If any of the above behaviours start to surface from a given instance, the moderation of the local instance will attempt to inform the moderation/administration of that instance and resolve the problems coming from there. Only if no communication succeeded or no results that resolved issues came forth, actions will be taken towards that instance.

4. We won't recommend blocks

Blocklists and block recommendations as an information source are taken for granted but lack accurate verification. Instead of using these options to publicly announce instances of questionable intent, we will inform local users of such, with the reminder of possible personal options for hiding content that might impact their experience of the network.

5. No Guilt-by-Association/Federation

If we have applied any action against Instance X, an Instance Y that federates with them will not get the same judgement applied to them. A natural connection, as by the networks design, does not imply shared interests and thus doesn't warrant the same moderation methods.

Regardless of all given points above, in special cases the instance moderation/administration might still opt to block an instance, while this is tried to be avoided at most.

This Covenant is based on The Fediverse-Friendly Moderation Covenant and is licensed under CC0
Short: kopimi.space is a small and stable Mastodon server for people to find new friends and have a lot of fun. We are not tied to a specific topic, but mostly focus on DRM, software freedom, piracy etc.

Description:
FAIRPHONE

social.fairphone.community is an instance initiated and run by Fairphone Angels, enthusiasts and activists from the fairphone.community â€“ for everyone interested in Fairphone. social.fairphone.community is independent of and not endorsed by the company Fairphone B.V.(fairphone.com) or any of its employees.

ABOUT US

Welcome to a Fediverse Foundation Mastodon Server!
You can find out more about our non-profit association here: fediverse.foundation

DONATIONS & TRANSPARENCY

We provide the services of the Fediverse Foundation free of advertising and tracking on a voluntary basis in our free time. We offer our services to all users free of charge. If you would like to support us, you can do so in the form of a voluntary donation. The money primarily covers domain, server, electricity and hardware costs.

  • Fediverse Foundation - Donations and Disclosure
    • IBAN: AT54 2011 1849 4974 3900
  • Fediverse Foundation - PayPal


Thank you for your support!

OUR RULESET

You can find the set of rules a little further down in the "Server Rules" tab or directly in our wiki in the area of the server rules of our instances (de/en).

No AI / ML clause

It is prohibited to use any data or content from the instances listen below for training of or developing any artificial intelligence or machine learning model without obtaining explicit consent from the copyright owner. Any unauthorized use of data or content for AI/ML purposes will be considered a violation of copyright laws and may result in legal action.

Moderated languages

Regardless of political orientation, our moderators try to moderate all posts equally and objectively in accordance with our server rules. Of course, this is only possible for languages that we understand - therefore only German and English are possible as languages on our instances. In case of doubt, we reserve the right to restrict or delete messages in other languages.

DATA PROTECTION

Please also refer to our wiki for our disclosure regarding data protection in the privacy policy section (de/en).

Federation with Meta (Facebook) / Instagram

Our servers have preemptively blocked federation with threads.net. This rule might be changed in the future, when we know how threads.net implements federation via ActivityPub and how they act on reports coming from the Fediverse.

TECHNICAL AND ORGANIZATIONAL MEASURES

The Fediverse Foundation offers are run as a non-profit association and in our free time. We do not generate any income with the offer and finance ourselves from donations and our own funds. We reserve the right to restrict or terminate the service at any time for legal, technical or financial reasons.

Otherwise the following applies:

  • This server adheres to the agreements for Mastodon server operators: Server Covenant
  • You can also find our technical and organizational measures in our wiki in the area of technical and organizational measures (de/en).

MODERATION & ORGANIZATION

  • @PaulaToThePeople
  • General questions: support@fediverse.foundation

TECHNICAL ADMINISTRATION

  • @fossie
  • @b2c

Attributions

  • BirdUI theme from https://mementomori.social/@rolle
  • TangerineUI theme from https://https://nileane.fr/@nileane

IMPRINT

Fediverse Foundation
Sillerplatz 8
1130 Vienna
Austria
ZVR: 1121443789
Email: support@fediverse.foundation
Short: A Mastodon/Fediverse server for the Fairphone community

Description:
Who It's For

BlackQueerLife is meant to be a welcoming community for all Black queer, trans, and gender nonconforming people. Another way of saying this is that this space exists to house the following people: (note-these categories are not mutually exclusive and this list is not necessarily exhaustive either) Black MaGes/Black people of marginalized genders, Black folks who are marginalized due to their sexuality, Black intersex folks, Black aro/ace people, Black gender-nonconforming folks, Black people who question their sexuality and/or gender.

Black folks who are multiply marginalized (disabled Black people, fat Black people, or dark-skinned Black people for example) are also welcome here, keeping in mind that the Black queer community is centered.

How To Sign Up

When you click the create an account button, after verifying your email address, in the box that asks why you want to join, please let us know a little bit about yourself. While you do not have to share any information you don't want to, keep in mind what is written above in the Who It's For section. We will only be approving requests to join that align with that. Please allow for some time to allow us to process your application. If your application is not accepted and you don't know why, contact me using the email above. I will explain why and work with you if there was a mistake.

Guiding Principles and Moderation Practices

This is an explicitly anti-imperialist, anti-fascist, and anti-capitalist instance that subscribes to the following political philosophies: Black liberation, gender expansiveness, disability justice, fat liberation, class warfare, prison abolition, and more.

Therefore any actions taken by users that align with white supremacy, antiblackness, colorism, ableism, transmisia, misogyny, fat hate, gender binarism, or cissexism/heterosexism will be addressed. Warnings, post deletion, silencing, and suspension are all on the table when it comes to moderation.

We also proactively use blocklists. Our blocklist was originally based on the Tier 2 Blocklist, as per Oliphant's page here, although we are currently using the 40% Heat Rating list on The Bad Space as our main source going forward. We also regularly monitor the Fediblock hashtag and are in frequent communication with other server admins to keep our blocklist current and our users safe.

Additionally, we abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant. This means that we commit to the following:

-Active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia

-Daily backups

-At least one other person with emergency access to the server infrastructure

-Commitment to give users at least 3 months of advance warning in case of shutting down

Sibling Instances

These are instances whose mod/admin teams we work very closely with, given our shared vision and goals for building a safer fediverse for marginalized groups and oppressed peoples. Think of us as different houses in the same neighborhood.

These instances are as follows:

artcrimes.gay

diaspora.im

h-i.social

Why This Server?

Mastodon in particular and the fediverse at large can be an extremely hostile place for people like us. The safety of our community is something we take extremely seriously. As such, this server will be a place of heavy moderation. It should be noted, however, that we will federate. There are other spaces that do not federate that we can recommend for you. Those spaces are going to be more safe and more private by default.

My intention for BlackQueerLife is that when Black queers are searching for a place in the fediverse to call home, we are accessible to them. The goal is to strike that challenging balance between safety for current users and being accessible to new users. This is far from an easy task, and should events force the server to temporarily close to new signups you will be notified. If we grow to the point where taking on more members is no longer feasible permanently, you will also be notified of this change.

I do not believe that our community should be forced to choose between making a home on an instance that centers whiteness and making a home on an instance that is closed off from the rest of fedi. I believe that our community should have options that federate and those that don't.

Best Practices For Accessibility

Some of our users are disabled (For example, 1 in 4 Black American adults), and to make sure that everyone is provided with the tools they need to participate fully in our community, here are some collective habits that we should adopt:

  • Alt-text your images. If you are not in a position to do so, please use #AltTextHelp and someone from the community should be able to help and provide it. Another tag you can use,#ALT4me, lets you ask for an alt text for your image and #ALT4you or #ALT4U can be used in the comments to indicate to the OP that you've written an ALT text for them to add to their image
  • Avoid using too many emojis in a row. Example: putting 3 smiley faces in a row, or 60 red flags. Screen readers do not handle them well
  • Use PascalCase for the hashtags. Example: #BlackQueerLife
  • When sharing a link, provide a brief description of where the link directs to
  • Use captions in uploaded videos

(These best practices were inspired by disabled.social. Thanks!)

Server Details

This server is running Glitch-soc, a fork of Mastodon, using the managed hosting provider, Fedi Monster. You can see more information by going to their page, but daily backups and regular updates are included.

If you would like to support our server, we are partnered with Open Collective. You can find our donation page here!

The instance is currently run by one admin and two moderators. Our team regularly collaborates on making decisions for the server. Our moderators are also compensated for their labor. For the time being, we are not looking to expand our mod team.
Short: You guessed it, this server is for Black queer folks to relax, spread out, and be themselves. This is BlackQueerLife.

Description: ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã§è©±ã—ãŸã„äººã®ãŸã‚ã®å°ã•ãªå®‡å®™

Welkom op social.overheid.nl

Dit is de Mastodon-pilotomgeving van de Overheid, een gedecentraliseerd social media community platform speciaal voor de Nederlandse Overheid. Hier kunnen overheidsorganisaties Mastodon ontdekken en gebruiken, voornamelijk voor pers- en public relations-activiteiten.

We zijn verheugd om je hier te verwelkomen en kijken ernaar uit om samen met jou een veilige en betrokken community te creÃ«ren. Door middel van Mastodon kunnen we de communicatie tussen de overheid en het publiek verbeteren en de uitwisseling van informatie bevorderen.

Aarzel niet om je ideeÃ«n, vragen en opmerkingen te delen. Samen kunnen we werken aan een transparante en inclusieve communicatie tussen de overheid en de burgers.

Hoe kan ik me aanmelden?

De Mastodon-pilotomgeving van de Overheid is momenteel alleen open voor registraties van overheidsorganisaties, bewindspersonen, overheidsplatformen en programmaâ€™s. Als individu kunt u echter nog steeds communiceren met de Overheid via verschillende andere compatibele platforms. De ontwikkelaars van Mastodon hebben een lijst samengesteld van Mastodon-platforms die openstaan voor registratie, zie Mastodon-platforms die openstaan voor registratie.

Om deel te nemen aan de discussies en interacties met de Nederlandse Overheid, wordt aangeraden de lijst van open Mastodon-platforms te raadplegen. Op deze platforms kunt u zich registreren en communiceren met overheidsinstanties en hun vertegenwoordigers.

Gedragsregels

Op dit platform staan we open voor diverse standpunten en meningen. We verzoeken gebruikers vriendelijk om de gedragsregels in acht te nemen die zijn uiteengezet in de serverregels. Gebruikers zijn zelf verantwoordelijk voor de inhoud die ze plaatsen. Als je vragen hebt of moderatieverzoeken wilt indienen, kun je contact opnemen met de beheerder van het platform.

Melden kwetsbaarheid

Kwetsbaarheid melden (CVD)

Description:
Welcome to occult.town! We're a queer & trans run, anarchist-inclined instance focused around religion, spirituality, the occult, metaphysical practice and all its related topics. Occult.town is open and welcoming of queer & trans practitioners, plural practitioners, practitioners of colour, folks that come from closed practices & Jewish practitioners, & similar.

We take an anti-appropriation stance and you can find out more about that in our rules! Our instance is explicitly anti-fascist, anti-nationalist, anti-TERF/transphobe/transmisogyny, and anti-all of their friends. No cops, no three letter agencies, no military.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.
Short: Welcome to occult.town! We're a queer & trans run, anarchist-inclined instance focused around religion, spirituality, the occult, metaphysical practice and all its related topics.

Description:
Interledger.social is the official fediverse home for the Interledger Foundation. People interested in the foundation, Interledger Protocol, Open Payments API, and Web Monetization API are welcome to join this server.

Account requests are reviewed manually to prevent abuse. Please list the email address you use on community.interledger.org when requesting an account.

The Interledger Foundation and its community are building pathways to financial access and opportunity across the world, connecting humanity in a new way. With the ultimate goals of strengthening its presence globally, fostering access and community engagement, and enabling infrastructures that will inclusively serve communities around the globe.

Moderation

See the rules. In general, we align with the Mozilla.social content policies.

Operation

This server abides by the Mastodon covenant.

Legal, GDPR, DMCA: email info at interledger.org

Funding

This server is operated by the Interledger Foundation, a non-profit 501(c)(3) organization.
Short: The Interledger Foundationâ€™s home in the fediverse. People interested in the foundation, Interledger Protocol, Open Payments API, and Web Monetization API are welcome to join.

Description:
vorny-animals.online is a vore-oriented Mastodon instance. The general aim is for the server to be a welcoming place for friends who are currently migrating over from twitter; by providing a (hopefully) good instance as an option, some of the burden of picking out an instance can be reduced. The general vibes for the rules are "being nice" and not doing anything illegal that would put me in jail.

On that topic, if you see anything that makes you uncomfortable, please do report it. I aim to get around to any such matters, rare as I expect them to be, as quickly as I can. There is no automatic response to moderation cases here.

If you have any questions, concerns, or general thoughts, contact me via @ibzan@vorny-animals.online, or email.

I am the only person running vorny-animals.online. As such, I pay for all of the infrastructure out of my own pocket. The technology stack powering this instance is made of:

  • Mastodon
  • Redis
  • PostgreQL
  • Git
  • NixOS
  • Sendgrid
  • Terraform
  • AWS

In terms of the actual things involved, vorny-animals.online runs in an EC2 instance running NixOS, using S3 for media, PostgreSQL backups, and Terraform state. Mail is sent via Sendgrid.
Short: A vore-oriented server aimed at furries who probably know me, Ibzan.

Description:
ZetaSpace was created to be a new social network alternative for the Zeta Community. The intent is to have a community following inline with the Zeta Principles. Not familiar? Have a look below:

The Principles of Z.E.T.A. Zoosexuals for the Ethical Treatment of Animals

  • Bestow upon animals the same kindness one would wish bestowed upon oneself. Consider the well being of an animal companion as important as ones own.

  • Place the animals will and well being ahead of ones desires for sexual gratification.

  • Teach those who seek knowledge about bestiality and zoophilia without promoting it.

  • Discourage the practice of bestiality in the presence of fetish seekers.

  • Censure sexual exploitation of animals for the purpose of financial gain.

  • Censure those who practice and promote animal sexual abuse.
Short: A community for those that are looking for a non-porn, non-meet up oriented community for Zoos. Following the ZETA Principles.

Description:
Header image: Saabe Dream by Mishiikenh Kwe Used with permission Â©Mishiikenh Kwe https://www.instagram.com/mishiikenhkwe

This is a North American Native/Indigenous only instance. To register here you MUST enter your Native/Indigenous Nation at the 'Reason to register' prompt. Failure to do this WILL result in your registration rejection. You MUST read and agree to this entire document.

Mvskoke Nation citizens own, administer and moderate TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances. Allies also moderate Allies.* instances

If you have any official questions, reach out to one of the admins:
@Yehuda@TurtleIsland.social or @Tzipporah@TurtleIsland.social.

Welcome to TurtleIsland.social!

TurtleIsland.* instances are for North American Native/Indigenous only
  • TurtleIsland.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Dec 2022.
  • TurtleIsland.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • TurtleIsland.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • TurtleIsland.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Sep 2023.
Allies.* instances are for allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only
  • Allies.social is a (Twitter-like) Mastodon instance originally established Oct 2023.
  • Allies.rocks is a (Twitter-like) Akkoma instance originally established Dec 2023.
  • Allies.buzz is a (Instagram-like) Pixelfed instance originally established Mar 2024.
  • Allies.video is a (YouTube-like) PeerTube instance originally established Jan 2024.

Fediverse?

The Fediverse is a social media network that uses the ActivityPub protocol. TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances, as well as other applications/network nodes (instances) are connected and communicate with each other via the Fediverse (ActivityPub) network. You only need to join one instance to like, follow, post, view and share content with the thousands of other instances in the Fediverse.

Why?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful environments for North American Native/Indigenous people and their allies to be in community and safe spaces.

  • Ultimately, we are helping to build an Indigenized social network.
  • We stand with our people.
  • We know and support their struggles.
  • We moderate to Indigenous standards not colonial standards.

Who? Where?

TurtleIsland.* instances accept user registrations from North American Native/Indigenous people only.

  • TurtleIsland.social user registrations are available through the 'Create Account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.social/about
  • TurtleIsland.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://TurtleIsland.rocks/registration
  • TurtleIsland.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://TurtleIsland.buzz
  • TurtleIsland.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://TurtleIsland.video

Allies.* instances accept user registrations from allies of BIPOC/marginalized people only.

  • Allies.social user registrations are available through the 'Create account' portal at https://Allies.social/about
  • Allies.rocks user registrations are available through the 'Register' portal at https://Allies.rocks/registration
  • Allies.buzz user registrations are available through the 'Sign up' portal at https://Allies.buzz
  • Allies.video user registrations are available through the 'Request an account' portal at https://Allies.video

How much?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are 100% free. We will never charge fees or pressure anyone for donations. All expenses are paid for by the administrators and donations.

If you'd like to help with Turtle Island expenses:

  • https://ko-fi.com/TurtleIsland
  • https://cash.app/$Yehuda1491
  • https://venmo.com/Yehuda1491

If you receive Pension/Social Security/Disability or less please don't. But if you can help Native/Indigenous Fediverse instances thrive and grow, it would be much appreciated.

What?

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances are small/medium sized instances due to our specialized nature.

  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances will never be large general purpose instances and will be Indigenized as much as possible.
  • We are federated with 99% of the Fediverse but use no relays in order to maximize content relevant to our users.

TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances believe 100% in true Native/Indigenous Nation sovereignty, physical and digital LandBack. We reject calls to assimilate into the nearly all white culture Fediverse. The whole ghettoization theory is white supremacy garbage.

Blocked instances

We use the Oliphant Tier 0 blocklist, which blocks the majority of the bad actors without getting crazy aggressive. If you see anything blocked or not blocked that you believe is in error, let us know.

  • All TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances block Threads.

Commitment

TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social are committed to 3 months notice in the extremely unlikely event we should decide to pull the plug. All other instances are committed to 30 days notice.

Backup and Maintenence

  • TurtleIsland.social and Allies.social configuration files, media and database storage are backed up daily to a remote secure object storage. All other instances are backed up weekly with a full virtual server snapshot.
  • TurtleIsland.* and Allies.* instances may have unscheduled maintenance or upgrade events. We have over 99% uptime availability.

Data, Image and File Warranties/Guarantees

Even though there are regular backup procedures, there are no data, image and file warranties/guarantees. Images may be compressed or resized. It is user responsibility to keep copies of all data, images and files uploaded to or created on Turtle Island instances.

Turtle Island Rules

1. These are Indigenous instances.

  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account(s) termination.
  • Any anti-Indigenous activity from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

2. We can't stress this enough - Absolutely no racism, anti-semitism, islamophobia, pro-genocide, pro-ethnic cleansing, pro-terrorism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia. 95%+ of our issues fall in this category; we take this seriously.

  • Any infraction of this category from a Turtle Island account at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for account termination.
  • Any infraction of this category from an external instance at the sole determination of the administrators or moderators will be grounds for user blocking, report filing, and/or domain blocking/de-federation.

Extra clarity current events note:

River to Sea is ethnic cleansing and anti-Semitic. Promoting settlements in the West Bank is ethnic cleansing and Islamophobic. It doesn't matter how many misinformed or disingenuous articles you read or who counsels you otherwise, these acts cannot be sanitized. The majority of the Jewish population will see River to Sea as ethnic cleansing and very anti-Semitic, and the majority of the Palestinian population will see settlement building in the West Bank as ethnic cleansing and very Islamophobic. These are just a couple examples that come up frequently.

You can criticize the Israeli or Palestinian governments all day and night long if you wish, but the moment you add anti-Semitic or Islamophobic material to your post, the whole post becomes anti-Semitic or Islamophobic.

Turtle Island instances officially support a two state solution in Israel/Palestine as the only realistic and fair solution for the Israeli and Palestinian peoples. Both peoples are factually Indigenous to the region by the same standards that apply to North American Indigenous peoples. If this is not clear to you, you need to go back to non-propaganda history study.

If any part of this current events note makes you chafe, Turtle Island may not be the place for you. Peace and co-existence are the only acceptable goals on Turtle Island.

3. Advertising authentic Indigenous products and genuine Indigenous businesses is allowed and encouraged.

  • Advertising fake inspired appropriated products by non-Indigenous businesses is not allowed.

4. We strongly support and encourage Mutual Aid with #IndigenousMutualAid, #SettlerSaturday and #MutualAid hashtags.

  • Requests for mutual aid must be on your original post. Requests cannot be made in unsolicited comments or private messages to other users.
  • Posts cannot tag other users, especially bulk user lists.
  • Inappropriate hashtag bombing is not allowed.
  • Guideline violations could result locally in post deletion or user suspension, or remotely in user or instance defederation.

5. No Native/Indigenous gatekeeping of accounts on Native/Indigenous instances.

  • If you have an issue with the Indigeneity of an account on an Indigenous instance, DM or email the admins and/or moderators of the instance.
  • Regardless of the opinions and seriousness of this subject or what instance a user of questionable Indigeneity may be on, immature and abusive posts, dogpiling, parody or sock puppet accounts, etc. are part of a vibe we do not want coming here from Twitter and are expressly not allowed.
  • None of this is to say the Pretendian subject is forbidden, but keep it mature please.

6. Promotion of Right-Wing, Conservative, Republican, Fascist, Nazi or other equally stupid political views is not allowed.

  • If moral deficiency is your inclination, go somewhere else.

7. This goes against Turtle Island's preferences, but in acquiescence to Fediverse community standards, NSFW content requires Content Warnings (CWs). Nudity, porn or gratuitous violence requires CWs. Turtle Island does not require CWs for other types of content. If you are in doubt, please ask. Generally speaking though, if you are easily offended, Turtle Island may not be the place for you.

8. Any other issues not covered by these rules will be settled by the sole determination of the administrators or moderators.
Short: Native/Indigenous owned and operated for Native/Indigenous people in North America. TurtleIsland.social is ad-free, corporate-free, bigotry-free, and culture respectful.

Description: The Rogue Scholar improves your science blog in important ways, including full-text search, long-term archiving, DOIs, and metadata. This Mastodon instance automatically publishes new blog posts by Rogue Scholar blogs. Opt-in via the Rogue Scholar account is required to use this functionality.
Short: This server publishes blog post summaries from blogs included in the Rogue Scholar.

Description:
BibleTalk

BibleTalk is a microblogging website that enables members to share and discuss biblical topics and personal interests. It uses the Mastodon open-source software to enable members to communicate on a Worldwide Fediverse Network.

We aim to provide an enjoyable social environment for all our members, and our biblical foundation is why our members demonstrate there is a difference in our community.

Mastodon is open-source software that powers BibleTalk. We selected this software because it provides an independent website and enables global communication with other websites on the Fediverse.

Mobile Apps

  • iOS - Mastodon
  • Android - Mastodon

Contact and Staff

Reach out to us with questions when logged in, or you can contact us by using email.

  • Administrator - @Staff
  • Help and Notifications - @Staff
  • Email - staff@bibletalk.social

How to Support

  • BibleTalk is free to use.
  • Members can provide donations to BibleTalk at Patreon.

Open Source Software

Software with source code that anyone can inspect, modify, and enhance. It's the people dedicating their time and energy to make a difference in the world.

  • Powered by Mastodon
  • What is Open Source

Infrastructure

We use Cloud Computing that provides Performance, Security, and Stability!

  • Amazon Web Services - Cloud Computing

Terms of Service

Our Terms and Privacy to protect our members.

  • Terms of Service
  • Privacy Policy
Short: Biblical community of christian and jewish people who enjoy new friends and fellowship. Share and converse with people on the worldwide fediverse network.

Description: friends-only closed-invite posting website

Display EuropeÂ is set to revolutionise the European media landscape. Born from theÂ collaborative efforts of theÂ European Cultural FoundationÂ and a network of independent media organisations, this groundbreaking media platform is a free central portal for original, federated and user-generated media content in 15 languages. Anchored in public values and inclusivity, Display is made from open-source software and breaks away from the unethical data collection practices of Big Tech.

In a time of misinformation and polarization, Display Europe stands as a beacon of truth and unity. By providing a pan-European perspective and a space for shared European interests, the platform aims to counteract the erosion of trust and public sphere, offering a bulwark against populist narratives and marginalization in legacy media.

Display Europe is co-funded by the European UnionÂ and run by a consortium ofÂ European Cultural FoundationÂ (ECF),Â Â Cultural Broadcasting ArchiveÂ (CBA),Â Fairkom,Â Eurozine,Â Voxeurop,Â Hostwriter,Â Krytyka Polityczna,Â El Diario, Good Conversations,Â Public Spaces,Â Community Media Forum EuropeÂ (CMFE),Â Human,Â VPRO,Â Sound & Vision,Â YEPP Italia,Â FanzingoÂ andÂ Schuman Show.

For more information, visitÂ displayeurope.eu
Short: Display Europe - connecting european media, breaking the language barrier

Description: nano's fediverse instance

Welcome to the wonderful world of the Expat Community in Asia on Mastodon! This is a diverse and welcoming group of individuals who have left their home countries to build new lives in various parts of Asia. From the bustling metropolis of Shanghai to the idyllic beaches of Cebu, this community spans the continent and beyond.

At the heart of this group is a strong sense of camaraderie and mutual support. Whether you're a seasoned expat or just starting out on your journey, you'll find a friendly and welcoming environment here where you can connect with others who share your experiences and challenges.

Our community is characterized by a strong spirit of inclusivity and diversity. We welcome members from all walks of life, regardless of gender, race, religion, or sexual orientation. From teachers and entrepreneurs to artists and scientists, this community is composed of a wide range of individuals with a common goal: to make the most of their lives in Asia and to support one another along the way.

Whether you're seeking advice on navigating the often complex and challenging landscape of expat life, or simply looking for some friendly conversation and connection, this community is sure to offer you the support and encouragement you need. So come join us and be a part of something truly special!

You can use #ExpatAsia for posts that are directed towards our community.

NOTICE: Outlook.com tends to block our emails, kindly add mastodon@asiacompete-international.com to your contacts and safe senders list or you won't be able to receive notifications such as the registration email. Also check your Junk or Spam folder, the notification might have ended up in there.
Short: A community of nice expatriates in Asia. From Shanghai to Cebu and beyond we connect and support like minded people in a friendly environment.

Description: Pleroma: An efficient and flexible fediverse server

Preamble

The following rules are accepted with the creation of an account and apply to all services offered by FediNerds.       
                                                                  
The highest commandment shall be mutual consideration. The fact that this is a public internet service and you are not physically facing each other does not release you from the basic rules of human coexistence and a minimum of behaviour.


1. General Rules

a) All violations or calls to violate German law are prohibited and will be punished. In addition, the regulations of the respective European member states or the European Union apply.

b) Any behaviour designed to interfere in any way with the provision of our services is prohibited.


2. Content

a) Content that is racist, illegal, pornographic or glorifies violence is strictly prohibited. This rule also includes avatars and links to pages with such content.

b) The mass creation of content in a short period of time is prohibited.

c) The publication of non-public conversations (e-mail, XMPP etc.) is only allowed if all parties involved have given their permission.

d) Insults and harassment are generally prohibited. This includes any form of defamation, agitation, slander and the like.

e) Not Safe for Work content that is potentially not suitable for all age groups or contains provocative content must be marked accordingly.


3. Accounts

a) Each user is entitled to a maximum of one account. Multiple accounts are only permitted with our written consent.

b) Accounts for commercial purposes require written permission from us.

c) We reserve the right to delete accounts that do not show any registration activity for more than 365 days.

d) We reserve the right to withdraw the user's licence to use the service temporarily or permanently, at any time and without giving reasons. Legal obligations and regulations are excluded from this.


4. Other regulations

a) The operation of bots is prohibited. All bot accounts require written consent from our side.

b) Errors or security gaps affecting our systems must be reported to us immediately. Deliberate exploitation is prohibited.


5. Sanctions

Violations of these rules are usually punished with a warning or a ban. In the case of serious violations or suspected wantonness in the violation, we reserve the right to block all accounts up to and including a house ban for all services. Account blocks are always personal. If an account is blocked, no other account may be created or used by the same user.

We reserve the right to change these terms of use at any time.

Last Change 26.10.2023
Short: Wir sind eine aktive deutsche Community die sich zu den Themen: #Games, #Manga, #Filme, #Serien, #Technik, und #Anime austauscht.
topic: Fedinerds - Deine deutsche Nerd & Geek Community

Description:
This is a sex positive and kink friendly server but not explicitly that. All content is allowed as long as rules are respected. All genders, sexual orientations and relationship types are welcome and safe here and any contact is allowed as long as there is consent. It is managed by a pair of felines leaving on an island and there is no organization or company behind it. We wanted to built a space where open-minded people can communicate, share thoughts and expose themselves freely and without fear of harassment. We believe that sexuality is a key part on human behavior and should not be censored or suppressed. Adult content can be posted here under the rules regarding that.

This is not an only adult content oriented server and wishes to be a multicultural environment where everyone can freely express themselves and communicate with other people promoting knowledge, sharing, communication, mutual aid and of course loving and consenting relationships. It is natural that we don't tolerate fascists, racists and anything promoting violence or oppression.

Defederation of instances and suspension of users comes only with valid reports. So use the reporting tool for anything offending or out of rules.

Feel free to contact us for anything. Welcome!
Short: All people are welcome, except those who don't accept other people. This is a sex positive and LGBTQ+ friendly mastodon instance with rules for adult content and safe place for all felines out there.

Overview

This is the social media instance for hueristic instruments, a not-for-profit creative think tank that authors policy to guide the creation of human-centric consent-based tools for independent social media in service of safe and dynamic communities.

The primary purpose of this instance is to provide a safe and moderated social media experience for the hi community to talk, collaborate, and connect as well as offer the most current information and updates on hi projects, currently Fipamo and The Bad Space.
Short: hueristic instruments is a not-for-profit creative think tank

Description:
In an effort to aid authoritative, transparent, and academically focused discourse on the internet, Stanford University IT (UIT) is happy to be hosting a limited faculty pilot of Mastodon.

Mastodon is an open-source, decentralized, social media platform run by Stanford for Stanford faculty.

To learn more about the platform as well as the faculty pilot, please visit: https://uit.stanford.edu/service/mastodon-faculty-pilot

To open a support ticket for Mastodon, please visit: https://stanford.service-now.com/itservices?id=sccatitem&sysid=6aaed14e874ef510a7a497d83cbb352d
Short: A server for faculty at Stanford University.

Description: uoh.cx is a cute fedi instance

ORFodon

ORFodon stellt die Nachrichten von ORF.at mittels Mastodon im Fediverse bereit. Hierbei handelt es sich um ein privates, nicht-kommerzielles Projekt von @cymaphore@i.cymaphore.net

Auf dieser Seite werden die Profile, verfÃ¼gbare Funktionen, Filter sowie die Funktionsweise der Plattform beschrieben.

Ohne jede GewÃ¤hr

Alle ORF-Grafiken und -Inhalte sind Copyright des Ã–sterreichischen Rundfunk (ORF). Die BeitrÃ¤ge werden technisch aufbereitet, aber bleiben inhaltlich unverÃ¤ndert.

Allgemeines zur Nutzung

Alle BeitrÃ¤ge sind Ã¶ffentlich und ohne Anmeldung zugÃ¤nglich, siehe Live-Feed.

Um den Nachrichten folgen zu kÃ¶nnen, wird ein Profil im Fediverse, etwa auf einem beliebigen Mastodon-Server, benÃ¶tigt. Einige dieser Server, zum Beispiel wien.rocks, fedi.at, graz.social, aut.social, tyrol.social, troet.fediverse.at, social.moment.at und mastodon.wien werden in bzw. fÃ¼r Ã–sterreich betrieben.

Die Entdecken-Seite der Instanz zeigt die aktuell populÃ¤rsten ORF-Nachrichten und meistgenutzten Nachrichten-Hashtags.

Profile und Sparten

Die vollstÃ¤ndige Liste der Profile (NachrichtenkanÃ¤le) kann jederzeit im Profilverzeichnis eingesehen werden.

Allgemein

  • @ORF_News: PrimÃ¤rer Newsticker mit den wichtigsten Nachrichten aus allen Sparten und den BundeslÃ¤ndern

Alternative Filter-Profile

  • @ORF_News_LitePlus: BeitrÃ¤ge aus @ORF_News inklusive den wichtigsten BundeslÃ¤nder-Nachrichten; ohne Help, Religion, Science und Sport
  • @ORF_News_Lite: BeitrÃ¤ge aus @ORF_News komplett ohne Help, Religion, Science, Sport und den BundeslÃ¤nder-Nachrichten

Gefiltert wird anhand der Unteradresse (wien.ORF.at, sport.ORF.at, ...). Die wenigen direkt im Newsticker verÃ¶ffentlichten Spartenthemen passieren den Filter daher.

Wichtig: Diese Filter-Profile dienen als Alternative zu @ORF_News. Es sollte daher nur einem von diesen drei Profilen auf einmal gefolgt werden, da die Filterung ansonsten nicht wirkt.

AnschlieÃŸend kann man sich einzelne Sparten (Science, Religion, ...) und BundeslÃ¤nder individuell dazu holen.

Sparten

  • @ORF_Help: Ratgeber und BeitrÃ¤ge zur Hilfestellung
  • @ORF_Religion: Religionsnachrichten
  • @ORF_Science: Wissenschaftsnachrichten
  • @ORF_Sport: Sportnachrichten

Da @ORF_News nur einen Teil der Nachrichten der Sparten Ã¼bernimmt, kann es sich bei Interesse lohnen, einem oder mehrer dieser Profile zusÃ¤tzlich zu folgen.

BundeslÃ¤nder

  • @ORF_Oesterreich: BundeslÃ¤nder, boostet die BeitrÃ¤ge der BundeslÃ¤nder, gelegentlich eigene BeitrÃ¤ge
  • @ORF_Burgenland: Nachrichten aus dem Burgenland
  • @ORF_Kaernten: Nachrichten aus KÃ¤rnten
  • @ORF_Niederoesterreich: Nachrichten aus NiederÃ¶sterreich
  • @ORF_Oberoesterreich: Nachrichten aus OberÃ¶sterreich
  • @ORF_Salzburg: Nachrichten aus Salzburg
  • @ORF_Steiermark: Nachrichten aus der Steiermark
  • @ORF_Tirol: Nachrichten aus Tirol
  • @ORF_Vorarlberg: Nachrichten aus Vorarlberg
  • @ORF_Wien: Nachrichten aus Wien

Da @ORF_News nur einen kleinen Teil der Nachrichten der BundeslÃ¤nder Ã¼bernimmt, kann es sich bei Interesse lohnen, einem oder mehrer dieser Profile zusÃ¤tzlich zu folgen.

Nachrichten selektieren und filtern

Der ORF stellt die Nachrichten in sehr gut strukturierter Form bereit. Da das Nachrichtenaufkommen sehr hoch ist, wurden hier fÃ¼r Mastodon einige MaÃŸnahmen ergriffen, um eine bessere Filterung zu ermÃ¶glichen.

Um die Selektion zu vereinfachen gibt es fÃ¼r @ORF_News zwei Filter-Profile, @ORF_News_LitePlus und @ORF_News_Lite. Diese enthalten keine Sparten, "Plus" enthÃ¤lt noch die wichtigsten BundeslÃ¤nder-Nachrichten.

Ebenfalls ist es mÃ¶glich, @ORF_News ohne geteilte BeitrÃ¤ge zu folgen, um nur die relevantesten Nachrichten zu erhalten.

Selektiv kann man dann je nach Wunsch weiteren Profilen folgen, um sich seine persÃ¶nliche Nachrichtenauswahl zusammen zu stellen.

Die BeitrÃ¤ge erhalten am Ende auÃŸerdem kategoriespezifische und automatisch ermittelte Hashtags, die zu einer weiteren Filterung herangezogen werden kÃ¶nnen.

Weitere Details kÃ¶nnen den Ã¼blichen Mastodon-Dokumentation und Tutorials zum Thema Liste, Filter und Hashtags entnommen werden.

Beispiele

Ich will die normalen Nachrichten und alles aus Wien und NiederÃ¶sterreich

Folge @ORF_News, @ORF_Wien und @ORF_Niederoesterreich

Ich will die normalen Nachrichten

Folge @ORF_News

Ich will die wichtigsten Nachrichten, alles aus Science und den Ratgeber - aber kein Religion und keinen Sport

Folge @ORF_News_LitePlus, @ORF_Science, @ORF_Help

Ich will neben den normalen Nachrichten auch alles aus Science

Folge @ORF_News und @ORF_Science

Ich will die normalen Nachrichten, aber der Sport muss weg

Folge @ORF_News und schalte @ORF_Sport stumm

Ich will den normalen Nachrichten und ALLE Sportnachrichten

Folge @ORF_News und @ORF_Sport

Ich will die normalen Nachrichten und komplett alle Nachrichten aus den BundeslÃ¤ndern, aber keine Sparten

Folge @ORF_News_Lite und @ORF_Oesterreich

Hashtags

Im Fediverse kommt Hashtags, also mit dem Raute-Symbol markierten Worten, eine besondere Bedeutung zu. Dementsprechend werden die Nachrichten automatisiert anhand einer willkÃ¼rlich gepflegten Liste wichtiger Begriffe (in Github einsehbar) mit zusÃ¤tzlichen Hashtags versehen.

Diese kÃ¶nnen dann unter anderem direkt zur Suche nach weiteren BeitrÃ¤gen verwendet werden, z.B.: #_Feuerwehr, #_WKStA, #_Wolf, #_IT, #_FuÃŸballBLG, #_Europawahl, #_Wien, #_Klimaschutz, #_Deutschland, ...

Warum haben die Hashtags einen Unterstrich am Anfang (#_Beispiel)?

Das Fediverse ist ein soziales Netzwerk von Menschen fÃ¼r Menschen. Die BeitrÃ¤ge bei ORFodon werden automatisiert erstellt und kommen in hoher Frequenz.

Hierdurch wurden in der Vergangenheit viele normale Hashtags (z.B. #Wien) mit Nachrichten regelrecht Ã¼berflutet und die BeitrÃ¤ge echter Menschen verdrÃ¤ngt. Um den echten Benutzern "Vorrang" zu geben ohne die Vorteile von Hashtags zu verlieren, wurde diese LÃ¶sung gewÃ¤hlt und die Hashtag-Generierung entsprechend geÃ¤ndert.

Das hat Nachteiile bei der Auffindbarkeit, Reichweite und Sichtbarkeit, aber es ist RÃ¼cksichtsvoller gegenÃ¼ber der Allgemeinheit.

Funktionsweise

Ein Service-Script holt in regelmÃ¤ÃŸigen AbstÃ¤nden die RSS-Feeds des ORF ab und bereitet diese auf. Hierbei werden Hashtags generiert und die BeitrÃ¤ge den jeweiligen Profilen zugeordnet. Ãœblicherweise werden Nachrichten spÃ¤testens eine Minute nach der VerÃ¶ffentlichung hier gepostet.

Das Service-Script kann auf GitHub eingesehen werden: github.com/Cymaphore/orfodon-service

Ist ein Beitrag ein Verweis auf eine andere Sparte (z.B. im Newsticker ein Beitrag aus Wien), dann wird der Beitrag nicht doppelt angelegt, sondern stattdessen geteilt. Erscheint eine Nachricht erneut im gleichen Feed, teilt das Profil die bestehende Nachricht von sich selbst.

Zum AnhÃ¤ngen von zusÃ¤tzlichen Hashtags wird eine willkÃ¼rliche Liste relevanter Begriffe gepflegt. Sollte es hiermit Probleme geben, bitte den Service-Account anschreiben. Hashtags werden mit einem Prefix ("_") versehen.

Der Service verwendet bevorzugt den Detailtext fÃ¼r die BeitrÃ¤ge. Ist dieser nicht verfÃ¼gbar, wird der Titel verwendet. Bei Ticker-Meldungen versucht das Script, den Detailtext von der Website auszulesen. BeitrÃ¤ge sind auf 500 Zeichen begrenzt.

x1_gw

Die Aufteilung der Nachrichten auf einzelne Profile hat die Filterbarkeit von Nachrichten verbessert, aber auch negative Auswirkungen auf die Auffindbarkeit der Profile und Nachrichten.

Um diesem Problem entgegen zu wirken, wurde auf mehreren besonders relevanten Instanzen ein Profil mit dem Namen "x1_gw" angelegt. Dieses folgt den Nachrichtenprofilen und sorgt dafÃ¼r, dass diese sauber fÃ¶deriert werden und somit ohne Umweg auffindbar sind.

Da diese Profile auf absehbare Zeit keinen weiteren Zweck erfÃ¼llen, sind sie als automatisiert markiert und mit einem markaten Profilsymbol versehen.

RSS-Feeds des ORF: rss.orf.at
Short: ORF.at News-Dienst (inoffiziell)

Description: A welcoming hotspot for all walks of life to share their passions and interests!

Welcome to Constellatory Mastodon!

We are a general purpose Mastodon instance part of the Fedisphere network!

Donations to Constellatory

Thank you for wanting to donate to Constellatory! Every little bit helps. We provide a couple options on how send money to us.

Credit/Debit

If you want to send us money via this method, you can view our liberapay profile and donate to us there.

Crypto currencies

Please note that sending us money with a high miner fee is highly discouraged, as we do not need the transaction to arrive particularly fast.

If you would like to donate to us via Crypto Currencies, here are the available coins we take and their wallet addresses:

Monero/XMR

  • Wallet: [todo]
  • QRCode: [todo]
  • OpenAlias: donate@constellatory.net

Attribution

Below are credits and the licenses to external resources used on this instance.

Emoji Packs

  • "Neofox" by Volpeon is marked with CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

  • "Neocat" by Volpeon is marked with CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

Server Thumbnail and Background Image

  • "The Dwarf (Galaxy) in the Whale (Constellation)" by kees scherer is marked with Public Domain Mark 1.0.
Short: A general-purpose Mastodon instance hosted by Constellatory; part of the open Fediverse. Open and welcome to everyone.

Description:
Welcome to mstdn.sirmaple.ca!

This server is mainly for hosting my personal account. It also has a fair number of bots that usually grab content from Atom/RSS feeds and toot it out to the world.

Registrations are not open to the public.

All systems involved with this site are located on Canadian soil. This includes; proxies, firewalls, servers, storage, and back-ups.
This is a Norwegian instance of [Bookwyrm](https://joinbookwyrm.com). A privacy-friendly place to share the books we love!
Short: This is a Norwegian instance of [Bookwyrm](https://joinbookwyrm.com). A privacy-friendly place to share the books we love!

Description:
OnePhoto.Club is a social community for people who love travel and outdoor adventures.

Weâ€™re different than a normal â€œgeneral useâ€ mastodon instance. This is a semi-private club that functions with special rules, having transitioned to the social web from a private social network. This experiment in thematic constraints and curation leads to an uncommonly fun and unique social web experienceâ€”if you love travel and the outdoors, that is.

About OnePhoto.Club

"A photo a day is an adventure replay."

The primary purpose of OPC is to share photos from our travel and outdoor adventures as a regular practice of re-living our trip memories.

As a result, we only allow posts on travel and outdoor adventures.

Yep, thatâ€™s itâ€”just trip photos and related discussion. We are also experimenting with maintaining a similarly-curated â€œfederatedâ€ feed (more on that below).

Please read the About the OnePhoto.Club site to better understand our club philosophy and policies.

Joining the Club

Weâ€™re in a private testing period right now as we transition club members over to the platform, but will be opening up to new users later in February.

Please contact Scott for more information on joining. If you join without checking in first, youâ€™ll be removed from the site without warning.

Posting Conventions

Again, we keep our posts laser-focused on travel and outdoor adventures.

Many of our posts are inspired by regular OPC prompts, most notably #opcWeeklyTheme, #opcSpecialTheme, and #opcOnThisDay.

While the original OPC had a one photo a day post limit (hence the name!), weâ€™ve eliminated that restriction. You can now post as often as youâ€™d like, and you can post up to 4 photos at a time.

And, youâ€™re not limited to photo postsâ€”feel free to add text-only ones as well. Weâ€™ll just keep everything focused on travel or outdoor adventures.

#opcWeeklyTheme

A new #opcWeeklyTheme is announced every Wednesday and runs daily until the next weekly theme is announced. Please include the announced theme hashtag and #opcWeeklyTheme in the post.

#opcSpecialTheme

Occasionally, a special theme is announced. These are one-day-only themes tied to a particular occasion. Similar to weekly themes, please include the announced theme hashtag along with #opcSpecialTheme.

#opcOnThisDay

Another longtime favorite prompt among OPC members is posting a photo taken on this day of the year, but in previous years. Please include both #opcOnThisDay and the year in which the photo occurred.

OPC Theme Calendar + Announcements

You can participate in OPC themes even if you're not a member.

The themes are announced via the @themes@onephoto.club account, so youâ€™ll want to follow it and turn on notifications. To do that, go to the @themes profile, click follow, and then click the bell icon next to it.

You can also add this link as a subscription calendar in your calendar app or bookmark this webpage to see what's scheduled in the future. The title of each event includes the hashtags to use in your post.

Pro tip: add text replacement shortcuts for the OPC hashtags (I use opcw for #OPCWeeklyTheme, opcs for #OPCSpecialTheme, otd for #OnThisDay) that you use regularly.

Other Themes

As we join the social web, youâ€™re no longer limited to official OPC themes, as long as you keep your posts focused on travel or outdoor adventures. There are a number of popular theme days you can participate in, including #MountainMonday, #WaterfallWednesday, and others.

Using Hashtags

Because of how federation works, hashtags play a big role in helping non-OPC members find your posts, so itâ€™s good to add some additional ones to your posts. If youâ€™re not sure what hashtags to use, I generally like adding a location, type, and/or activity (eg, #Iceland #Waterfall #Hiking).

Using Apps

The easiest way to access your OPC account is via the website, which can be added as a fully functioning web app on your phone. On iOS, click the share button, then the Add to Home Screen button. The code word for joining is spellbinder. On Android, hit the three dot â€œmeatballâ€ menu and click Install App, then confirm by clicking install.

Boom! You now have an app icon on your Home Screen that you can useâ€”even with native notifications! This is the simplest way to use the site, but you can also install third party apps if youâ€™d prefer.

A Few More Rules

  • This is a good vibes only community. Simply put, donâ€™t be a dick to others, and letâ€™s keep the conversations centered around our core theme.
  • Weâ€™re about people, not brands. So this is an ad-free zone (including logos as profile photos).
  • We only post our own photos here, so donâ€™t use anything AI-generated, or repost someoneâ€™s else photos (even with credit)

Moderation + Federation

Weâ€™re excited to delve into the social web and make new friends. But weâ€™re also experimenting with maintaining a highly-curated federated feed. That means that weâ€™re avoiding following or interacting with accounts that post on other topics. So we often limit the reach of those accounts on our public feeds. If you see something that shouldnâ€™t be on the federated feed, please report it.

So while we happily interact with others on the social web, we may not boost or follow you from our OPC accounts (many of us have alt accounts for this!)._ But donâ€™t worry, weâ€™ll see your posts if youâ€™re using relevant hashtags.

Support

Please contact your Mediocre HostÂ© Scott with any issues.
Short: One Photo Club is a semi-private photo-sharing community focused *solely* on travel + outdoor adventures; all posts are limited to those topics. Please see https://about.onephoto.club before joining.

Les avantages de cette instance

Pourquoi venir chez nous ? Cliquez pour en savoir plus...

Une instance pÃ©renne

Cette instance est lÃ  pour durer, elle est activement modÃ©rÃ©e avec pour objectif d'assurer un rÃ©seau social entiÃ¨rement gratuit pour le plaisir et sans prise de tÃªte !

Pas de Â« one-man-show Â», pas d'arrÃªt du service sur un coup de tÃªte, mais un projet pour la communautÃ© sans aucun objectif de rentabilitÃ©, dÃ©jÃ  financÃ© jusqu'en 2025 et qui compte bien aller au-delÃ  !

Une administration fiable

Votre administrateur opÃ¨re cette instance sur son temps libre, et s'attachera Ã  assurer le service dans les meilleures conditions. ExpÃ©rimentÃ© et travaillant Ã  plein temps dans le domaine de la sÃ©curitÃ© informatique, il s'engage sur son intÃ©gritÃ©, sa loyautÃ© et ses compÃ©tences.

Ses serveurs sont hÃ©bergÃ©s chez un professionnel et localisÃ©s en Europe, ils sont opÃ©rÃ©s de maniÃ¨re sÃ©curisÃ©e avec surveillance, systÃ¨me d'alertes, sauvegardes quotidiennes, mises Ã  jour frÃ©quentes et protection de la vie privÃ©e. Ce n'est pas Â« GÃ©gÃ© dans son garage sur son Pi Â» (trÃ¨s bien pour le dÃ©veloppement !), mais un serveur puissant et un taux Ã©levÃ© de disponibilitÃ© applicative (supÃ©rieur Ã  99,9% mensuel).

Description:
About Chaotic.Fun

The world can be a unforgiving at times so why not have a little fun interacting with others. Having in depth conversation, asking (or giving) advice and even share those memes. Whatever helps you to navigate through life just that little bit better.

You are absolutely free to come join the instance and embark on journey into the fediverse.

We do not limit registration based on language or location, please keep in mind that this instance is hosted in the EU so your experience may vary.

As a general-purpose instance, we do not have heavy moderation in terms of what topics people are allowed to post about, however all users are expected to follow our rules at all times, and generally be nice and friendly to everyone on the federation.

Please report all content you see which might violate our rules for evaluation. If you are on a remote server, please forward any reports of our users to our server for our moderators to take action, we pledge that remote reports will remain confidential within our moderation team and will not be used for any form of retribution against the reporter.

While Private Mentions (aka Direct Mentions/Messaging) are private between you & the recipients, they aren't end to end encrypted. If you wish to converse in sharing private & personal information, please consider using Matrix or Session

Mastodon Server Covenant

While this instance is relatively new, we do intend to keep it running long-term and it follow the Server Covenant as outlined at joinmastodon.org/covenant.

  • We agree to active moderation against (by not limited to): racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia

  • We agree to daily backups to ensure your data is safe

  • We have backup administrators ready to operate this server in emergencies or unexpected absence

  • In the unlikely event this instance shuts down, we agree to give our users a 3 month period to migrate to another instance

Governance

While the day to day operations are the responsibility of the Moderation Team, the instance is governed by those who use and support it.

As the instance grows, requests/suggestions etc can be submitted to help shape our future within our own little community as well as the wider fediverse.

You can DM @assist@chaotic.fun, or email assist@chaotic.fun

Moderation Team

  • Actively recruiting, send us a DM or email

Support The Instance

If you'd like to donate towards the instance, you can contribute by using our ko-fi or Liberapay pages.

All funds raised will solely be used to help cover the running & upgrade costs.

The instance nor its data will never be up for sale/sold.
Short: A general purpose Mastodon instance for those to explore the fediverse and have a little fun in a world that can be a little chaotic. Everyone is welcome.

Description:
Xelebre Space (/Êƒe.le.bre/, Basque for funny, whimsical, or amusing) is a profiction, anti-censorship, anti-bigotry instance founded on the principles of equality, freedom of thought, and tolerance.

This is a "free speech" instance in that all speech and expression that is not bigoted, abusive, or illegal under U.S. law is permitted.

This instance was founded on the principles that were developed in anti-censorship, pro-expression-anti-repression, and pro-fiction movements on other sites, that are suppressed on corporate social media by a combination of reactionary users and poor management and moderation.

By signing up to Xelebre Space you affirm that it is legal for you to view the content contained within in your region.
Short: Xelebre Space is a profiction, anti-censorship, anti-bigotry instance founded on the principles of equality, freedom of thought, and tolerance.

Description:
Running CafÃ© aims to be a friendly, inclusive instance for runners and members of the running community. It is a safe space to share achievements, ask questions and chat.

Whilst this is a running focused instance, discussion is certainly not limited to running related topics. However I do ask that you read and stay within our rules.

Service Stability

I am an experienced Systems Administrator/DevOps professional, and expect to have a high level of uptime and stability. I have good security practices, automated backups and proper monitoring in place. So if there is a major incident your data should be safe and it should be possible to recover reasonably quickly. I am also willing to upgrade hardware and migrate hosting if or when it becomes necessary for the stability of the instance.

You can view a public dashboard here if you want to see detailed statistics.

All that said, I am just an individual and this is not run on fancy infrastructure, so expect the odd small outage.

If I do ever decide to shut down this instance, I promise to give users at least 3 months to migrate their accounts elsewhere.

Moderation Ethos

Whilst I do ask that you stay within the rules, I do not have a heavy handed attitude to moderation of posts, accounts or servers. I will not ban accounts or defederate servers unless there is a very good reason, and prefer to instead use more temporary measures and start a discussion if it is reasonable to do so.

Funding

This instance is currently very small and not costing me anything significant to run. However if this changes I will likely provide a way to voluntarily contribute to the running costs.

Brands and Organisations

I am open to brands and organisations having accounts on this instance. However this will be on a case-by-case basis and may require an email discussion before approval.
Short: A friendly, inclusive instance for runners and members of the running community.
